scripts.copy-bootstrap: powershell -Command "if (-not (Test-Path 'assets/css')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'assets/css' -Force }; if (-not (Test-Path 'assets/js')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'assets/js' -Force }; Copy-Item 'node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' 'assets/css/'; Copy-Item 'node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js' 'assets/js/'"
